text_block_list.text:
It's been a few days since Tap Dance City and I 
started chasing our dreams――
choice_data_list: <size=38>(Oh? There's a sketchbook on the ground.)</size>
<size=38>(Oh? There's a sketchbook on the ground.)</size>

text_block_list.text:
I pick it up and take a look inside. It's full of 
illustrations and comics about races. 
And they look really good, too.
――Fantastic!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
You can really tell she's putting her heart and soul into the last spurt! 
Their hooves are ripping up the turf and the audience is losing their 
voices from cheering so hard for the battle on the final straight!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
It's awesome, I can really feel the sense of wonder and adventure! 
Hey, did you draw this, Trainer?!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
Then it must be from a student! Wow, who knew 
there was someone here who could draw like this?!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
...Let's go find her, Trainer! We'll uncover 
the mystery of the legend who created this!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
choice_data_list: You mean, return it to its owner...?

text_block_list.text:
Hmm... "Returning it to its owner" is lacking in impact. 
You gotta spice up the phrasing a bit!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
How about... This: 
"We're going on a journey to return her lost dreams!"
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
――And with that, Tap Dance City and I set out 
to find the owner of the sketchbook.

...Although, there's no name written anywhere. 
This might end up being a bit of a challenge――
――Man, oh man. Still no trace of her.
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
As expected of someone so talented! 
I'm only getting more excited to meet her!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: ――I'm not... talented at all.

I look into the direction of that voice, 
and there I see a horsegirl standing there alone.

Yes... But I don't want it back. 
Please throw it away...
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A

text_block_list.text: Why? How could you throw away something so amazing...?
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
... 
I already... threw it away myself!
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A

text_block_list.text:
You see, I've wanted to be a manga artist even before joining 
Tracen Academy. I've continued to draw in secret ever since.
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A

text_block_list.text:
But... Yesterday, one of my friends saw it and laughed at me... 
That was the last straw for me.
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A

text_block_list.text:
I've had to share my passion with two different dreams, 
and it's been detrimental for both... It's about time I let go 
of what remnants of my old dream I still have.
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A

text_block_list.text: ...Mere remnants? No, no, no, no. That's where you're wrong. You ought to hold onto that book!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: ...! What makes you think you can say that to me?!
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A

text_block_list.text:
I can feel it. I don't know anything about manga, 
but I can feel your passion just by looking at it.
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: This book, it's a treasure chest full of your passion for epic tales!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
You must never throw it away. Without it, 
you'll never be able to run again the same way.
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
Choosing between dreams... That's merely something 
you made up in your head! Let yourself be guided by both!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
... Haha... 
You make it sound so easy...
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A

text_block_list.text: In the end, she took the sketchbook back from Tap Dance City.
And she promised to never throw it away again.
Look, we managed to return the lost dreams to her after all.
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
choice_data_list: The way you described it earlier...
The way you described it earlier...

text_block_list.text:
Ah, you mean the treasure chest full of your passion for epic tales? 
Haha! Well, you've got one too, Trainer.
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
Your notebook in which you write down our training plans! 
It holds our dreams. It's our adventure map!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
I just showed her why she should continue her journey. 
I showed her the joy of chasing after adventure, that's all!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
